attributes.action: ensure that Identity Cards are issued to UK residents free of charge if they made compulsory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Passports, driving licences etc are currently chargeable, but they are not compulsory - it is a matter of personal choice whether one wishes to travel overseas or drive a vehicle.   Identity Cards, on the other hand, if they are introduced, will be a legal requirement for all residents of the UK.  This being the case, people should not be required to pay for something which is not optional.
